content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (x=-10.0, y=-50.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-9.5, y=-48.5) that feeds into the stone furnace
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-13.5, y=-52.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-15.5, y=-53.5)
- BeltGroup connecting various entities, with belts positioned from (x=-16.5, y=-54.5) to (x=-14.5, y=-54.5) and from (x=-12.5, y=-54.5) to (x=-10.5, y=-54.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing wooden chests
- Ensure there is a suitable, unoccupied position before attempting to place a wooden chest.

### Errors when connecting belts directly from a stone furnace
- Use an inserter to connect belts from a stone furnace, as belts cannot be connected directly.

### Insufficient coal to refuel all inserters
- Maintain an adequate supply of coal to ensure all inserters are refueled and operational.

### No iron plates found in the furnace
- Investigate the supply chain to ensure raw materials are being delivered to the furnace for smelting.
